description: A lovely and spacious studio apartment in a beautiful New York City pre-war building, located in a quiet, peaceful neighborhood. It's 1 minute walking distance from the A express train. The studio is divided into three separate rooms: living space, kitchen, and bathroom. The kitchen is fully equipped with utensils, pots & pans, stove, oven, microwave, fridge and breakfast table. Close by are several parks, hiking trails, as well as a spectacular view of the George Washington Bridge.
name: Spacious Studio Apartment in Quiet Neighborhood
review: Uri was gracious and hospitable! The space was clean, open and warm.
